segments.text: Hello , I want to make a reservation for a Qingdao cruise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . There is one on Wednesday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good ! How much does the sea view stateroom cost for per person ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Does that include fees for shore excursions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . It doesn't . But it includes all other on board activities .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks a lot . Give me one ticket , please .
segments.speaker: S1
